allowedSelectors(address,bytes4).notice: Check if a selector is allowed for a target

allowedTargets(address).notice: Check if a target is in the allowlist

allowedTokens(address).notice: Check if a token is in the allowlist

batchSetAllowedSelectors(address,bytes4[.notice: Batch update selectors for a target

executeBatch((address,uint256,bytes)[],(.notice: Execute a batch of calls on behalf of a delegating EOA

setAllowedSelector(address,bytes4,bool).notice: Add or remove a selector for a specific target
